com.flowpowered.react.constraint

Class HingeJoint.HingeJointInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.react.constraint.Joint.JointInfo
      • com.flowpowered.react.constraint.HingeJoint.HingeJointInfo
  • Enclosing class:
    HingeJoint

    public static class HingeJoint.HingeJointInfo
extends Joint.JointInfo
    This structure is used to gather the information needed to create a hinge joint. This structure will be used to create the actual hinge joint.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HingeJointInfo(RigidBody body1, RigidBody body2, Vector3 initAnchorPointWorldSpace, Vector3 initRotationAxisWorld)
      Constructs a new unlimited and non-motored hinge joint info from the both bodies, the initial anchor point in world space and the init axis, also in world space.
      HingeJointInfo(RigidBody body1, RigidBody body2, Vector3 initAnchorPointWorldSpace, Vector3 initRotationAxisWorld, float initMinAngleLimit, float initMaxAngleLimit)
      Constructs a new limited but non-motored hinge joint info from the both bodies, the initial anchor point in world space, the initial axis, also in world space, and the upper and lower limits of the joint.
      HingeJointInfo(RigidBody body1, RigidBody body2, Vector3 initAnchorPointWorldSpace, Vector3 initRotationAxisWorld, float initMinAngleLimit, float initMaxAngleLimit, float initMotorSpeed, float initMaxMotorTorque)
      Constructs a new limited and motored hinge joint info from the both bodies, the initial anchor point in world space, the initial axis, also in world space, the upper and lower limits of the joint, the motor speed and the maximum motor torque.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector3 getAnchorPointWorldSpace()
      Returns the anchor point in world space.
      float getMaxAngleLimit()
      Returns the upper angle limit.
      float getMaxMotorTorque()
      Returns the max motor torque.
      float getMinAngleLimit()
      Returns the lower angle limit.
      float getMotorSpeed()
      Returns the motor speed.
      Vector3 getRotationAxisWorld()
      Returns the rotation axis in world space.
      boolean isLimitEnabled()
      Returns true if the limits are active.
      boolean isMotorEnabled()
      Returns true if the motor is enabled.

      • Methods inherited from class com.flowpowered.react.constraint.Joint.JointInfo

        getFirstBody, getPositionCorrectionTechnique, getSecondBody, getType, isCollisionEnabled, setCollisionEnabled, setFirstBody, setPositionCorrectionTechnique, setSecondBody

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
